info.description: Monitoring Instrumentation Data Acquisition Systems (MIDAS) Web API
info.title: MIDAS Web API

get.summary: lists all submittals for an instrument

put.summary: verifies all current submittals for the alert config are "missing" and will not be completed
updates settings for an alert subscription

get.summary: lists alert configs for a project
lists alert configs for a project

get.summary: gets a datalogger by id

delete.summary: deletes a datalogger by id

gets information for the homepage

get.summary: lists subscribed alerts for a single user

post.description:
marks an alert as read for a profile
returning the updated alert
post.summary: marks an alert as read

post.description:
marks an alert as unread based on provided profile ID and alert ID.
returning the updated alert
post.summary: marks an alert as unread for a profile

get.summary: gets profile for current authenticated user
lists projects for current profile

delete.summary: deletes a token for a profile

get.summary: lists all instruments, represented as opendcs sites

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and access token.
Bearer.name: Authorization

scopes.admin: Grants read and write access to administrative information
scopes.project_admin: Grants project members read and write access to projects
scopes.project_member: Read and write permissions per-project granted by project admin
